items.title: Welcome to the First Baptist Church Wapato Blog
items.excerpt: We’re glad you’re here. This blog is a place to share encouragement, Scripture reflections, church updates, and messages that point us to Jesus Christ.

items.title: A Church Rooted in Truth and Love
items.excerpt: At First Baptist Church Wapato, we exist to exalt Jesus Christ as Lord by seeking, teaching, and caring for people in our church, community, and the world.
